LanguageData.Taggerung_SCP_ScariaImmunity.label: genetic zombie immunity
LanguageData.Taggerung_SCP_ScariaImmunity.description: Carriers of this gene are immune to the zombie virus.
LanguageData.Taggerung_SCP_ScariaCarrier.label: genetic zombie
LanguageData.Taggerung_SCP_ScariaCarrier.description: Carriers of this gene are infected by the zombie virus at the genetic level and can never be cured, curing them will only temporarily remove the infection.\n\nWhile the virus can never be cured, it may be possible suppress it.
